title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Skills: Community of Practice-Based Instructional Designer Professional Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Successfully complete three or more instructional design projects through Community of Practice (CoP) activities
Develop two or more prototypes of instructional designs for science education incorporating peer feedback
Acquire five or more latest trends in instructional design through weekly online collaborative learning
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
